name: Jessicahillart
body:
About Me

I am a Graphic and Web Designer living in Nashville, TN. I became interested in Front-End Web Design and Development because I want to help others learn the basics of web design and development, and not to be scared of jumping in!

My Mission

As I learn more about front-end, I hope to one day work as a Mentor for General Assembly because I like to work in a creative, challenging and supportive environment.

My Experience

This is how I have evolved professionally:

  • Graphic and Web Desiger, Nashville Entrepreneur Center www.ec.co Nashville, TN, 2013- Current

  • Graphic Design and Marketing, Nashville Technology Council Nashville, TN, 2011- 2013

  • Environmental Graphic Designer,Gresham Smith and Partners Nashville, TN, 2009- 2011

Education

PRATT Manhattan, HTML and Web Design courses, 2000

University of the Arts, BFA Graphic Design, 1999

Other

Ongoing Freelance Graphic and Web Design

T-shirt design for Hot Topic and Shirt Woot

Character Development Sketches for Nick Jr

If you are interested in collaborating with me on a project, feel free to email me at: Jessica Hill
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
